services.title: Professional Manpower Supply
services.description: Providing skilled, certified, and reliable workforce solutions tailored to the unique demands of construction and industrial projects.
services.detailedDescription: At Evergreen Intelligent Company Ltd (EIC), we understand that the backbone of any successful project is its workforce. Our Manpower Supply division is dedicated to bridging the gap between talent and opportunity, providing top-tier professionals and skilled laborers to the construction, oil & gas, and industrial sectors across Saudi Arabia. We go beyond simple staffing; we offer comprehensive workforce management solutions that ensure productivity, safety, and compliance.
keyBenefits: Strict Compliance with Saudi Labor Laws

process.title: Needs Assessment
process.description: We analyze your project requirements, timeline, and specific skill gaps to create a tailored staffing plan.

process.title: Sourcing & Screening
process.description: Our recruitment team leverages a vast database to identify candidates, conducting rigorous interviews and skill tests.

process.title: Mobilization & Onboarding
process.description: We handle all logistics, including visas, medicals, and safety induction, ensuring workers arrive ready to perform.

process.title: Ongoing Management
process.description: We provide continuous support, managing payroll, accommodation, and performance to ensure seamless operations.

services.title: Electrical Subcontracting Services
services.description: Delivering comprehensive electrical engineering, installation, and maintenance solutions with a focus on safety and efficiency.
services.detailedDescription: EIC's Electrical Subcontracting division offers end-to-end electrical solutions for complex industrial and commercial projects. From high-voltage transmission systems to intricate low-current installations, our team of certified engineers and technicians ensures every connection is safe, reliable, and efficient. We combine technical expertise with cutting-edge technology to power the infrastructure of tomorrow, adhering to the highest international standards of quality and safety.
keyBenefits: Adherence to NEC, IEC & SASO Standards

process.title: Design & Engineering
process.description: We develop detailed electrical designs, load calculations, and schematics optimized for efficiency and safety.

process.title: Procurement & Supply
process.description: We source high-quality materials and equipment from trusted global manufacturers to ensure system longevity.

process.title: Installation & Execution
process.description: Our skilled technicians execute installations with precision, following strict safety protocols and project timelines.

process.title: Testing & Commissioning
process.description: We conduct rigorous testing to verify system performance and safety before final handover.

services.title: Mechanical Subcontracting Solutions
services.description: Expert mechanical engineering, fabrication, and installation services for HVAC, piping, and industrial systems.
services.detailedDescription: Our Mechanical Subcontracting division is equipped to handle the most demanding mechanical challenges in the construction and industrial sectors. We specialize in HVAC systems, industrial piping, and structural steel fabrication. With a focus on precision engineering and operational excellence, EIC delivers mechanical systems that optimize performance, reduce energy consumption, and ensure long-term reliability for your facilities.

process.title: System Design
process.description: We design mechanical systems tailored to your facility's specific cooling, heating, and flow requirements.

process.title: Fabrication
process.description: Our off-site and on-site fabrication teams produce high-quality ductwork, piping spools, and steel structures.

process.title: Installation
process.description: We install complex mechanical systems with minimal disruption to ongoing operations, ensuring perfect fit and function.

process.title: Balancing & Commissioning
process.description: We fine-tune systems for optimal performance, ensuring air and fluid flows meet design specifications.

services.title: General Contracting & Construction
services.description: End-to-end construction management and execution for residential, commercial, and industrial projects.
services.detailedDescription: EIC serves as a premier General Contractor, taking full responsibility for the successful execution of construction projects. From site preparation to final finishing, we manage every aspect of the build. Our integrated approach combines civil, electrical, and mechanical expertise to deliver turnkey projects that stand the test of time. We are committed to building infrastructure that drives progress and improves communities.

process.title: Pre-Construction
process.description: We conduct site surveys, feasibility studies, and detailed planning to set a solid foundation for the project.

process.title: Project Management
process.description: Our dedicated PMs oversee all activities, coordinating resources and ensuring milestones are met.

process.title: Construction Execution
process.description: We manage all civil works, structural builds, and finishing trades with our skilled in-house teams.

process.title: Handover & Closeout
process.description: We ensure a smooth transition with comprehensive documentation, as-built drawings, and warranty support.
